mapper.select: SELECT m.member_no, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.icon_no, p.member_point, l.member_level, pif.pfp_name, pif.pfp_extension FROM member m JOIN point p ON m.member_no = p.member_no JOIN level l ON p.member_point >= l.level_to_point LEFT JOIN profile_image_file pif ON m.member_no = pif.member_no WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.member_point >= l.level_to_point ORDER BY l.member_level DESC LIMIT 1

(SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_name = '${post_member_no}'), (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_name = '${get_member_no}'), '${message_title}','${message_content}' )
